title: Episode 284: Sabrina Carpenter

title: Los Temerarios Close Farewell Tour in Mexico After 47-Year Career: ‘We Have Reached the End!’
description: The band, led by brothers Adolfo and Gustavo Ángel, thrilled fans Friday at the first of their last two shows at the GNP Seguros Stadium in Mexico City.

title: Spotify Uses "Ghost Artists" to Minimize Royalty Payouts, New Report Alleges
description: Spotify's use of low-cost, pseudonymous tracks in its playlists is undercutting the work of real musicians, according to an explosive report published by Harper's Magazine.
